member.summary: Seed for random scheduling strategies.

member.summary: If true, the P# tester performs a full exploration, and does not stop when it finds a bug.

member.summary: The maximum scheduling steps to explore for unfair schedulers. By default there is no bound.

member.summary: The maximum scheduling steps to explore for both fair and unfair schedulers. By default there is no bound.

member.summary: True if the user has explicitly set the fair scheduling steps bound.

member.summary: Number of parallel bug-finding tasks. By default it is 1 task.

member.summary: Runs this process as a parallel bug-finding task.

member.summary: The testing scheduler unique endpoint.

member.summary: The testing scheduler process id.

member.summary: The unique testing process id.

member.summary: If true, then the P# tester will consider an execution that hits the depth bound as buggy.

member.summary: The priority switch bound. By default it is 2. Used by priority-based schedulers.

member.summary: Delay bound. By default it is 2. Used by delay-bounding schedulers.

member.name: F:Microsoft.PSharp.Configuration.CoinFlipBound
member.summary: Coin-flip bound. By default it is 2.

member.summary: Safety prefix bound. By default it is 0.
